resources.string: Battery %1$s percentage, about %2$s left based on your usage
Revoke access to USB debugging from all computers you\'ve previously authorised?
USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. Use it to copy data between your computer and your device, install apps on your device without notification and read log data.
Battery Saver will turn on automatically once battery goes below %d%%.
Plugged in, can\'t charge at the moment
%1$s remaining, about %2$s left based on your usage
Couldn\'t pair with %1$s because of an incorrect PIN or passkey.
Sharing local Internet connection with device
Connected to device for Internet access
Trigger Bluetooth Audio Codec\10Selection: Bits Per Sample
Trigger Bluetooth Audio Codec\10Selection: Channel Mode
Bluetooth audio LDAC codec: Playback quality
Trigger Bluetooth Audio LDAC\10Codec Selection: Playback Quality
Trigger Bluetooth Audio Codec\10Selection: Sample Rate
You\'re connected to %1$s, which can monitor your personal network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
Capture all Bluetooth HCI packets in a file (toggle Bluetooth after changing this setting)
Convert data partition to file-based encryption.\10 !!Warning!! This will delete all your data.\10 This feature is alpha, and may not work correctly.\10 Press \'Wipe and convert…\' to continue.
The data limit that you set has been reached. You are no longer using mobile data.\10\10If you resume, charges may apply for data usage.
Swipe diagonally down and left for %s.
Swipe diagonally up and left for %s.
Swipe diagonally up and left for %s.
Swipe diagonally up and right for %s.
When we are no longer monitoring with the persistent logger, we are required to erase the logger data resident on your device.
These settings are intended for development use only. They can cause your device and the applications on it to break or misbehave.
You can optimise the battery lifetime by enabling STAMINA mode.
The eSIM can’t be disabled due to an error.
Make all activities resizeable for multi-window, regardless of manifest values.
There’s an issue charging this device. Unplug the power adaptor, and take care as the cable may be warm.
Your phone will automatically try to cool down. You can still use your phone, but it may run more slowly.\10\10Once your phone has cooled down, it will run normally.

This input method may be able to collect all the text you type, including personal data such as passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the app %1$s.\10Before use, you should read their Privacy Policy, Terms of Use or guidelines (if applicable).\10\10Use this input method?
Destroy every activity as soon as the user leaves it
Install Android File Transfer application for Mac
App opened without being installed. Tap to find out more.
Total silence. This will also silence screen readers.
Your SIM card has been permanently disabled.\10 Contact your wireless service provider for another SIM card.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %1$d times. After %2$d more unsuccessful attempts, the work profile will be removed, which will delete all profile data.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %1$d times. After %2$d more unsuccessful attempts, this user will be removed, which will delete all user data.
You have incorrectly drawn your unlock pattern %1$d times. After %2$d more unsuccessful attempts, you will be asked to unlock your phone using an email account.\10\10 Try again in %3$d seconds.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %1$d times. After %2$d more unsuccessful attempts, this phone will be reset, which will delete all its data.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. The work profile will be removed, which will delete all profile data.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. This user will be removed, which will delete all user data.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. This phone will be reset, which will delete all its data.
PUK code should be 8 digits long.
Enter SIM PIN, you have %d attempt remaining before you must contact your network operator to unlock your device.
Incorrect SIM PIN code. You have %d remaining attempt before you must enter your PUK code (PIN unlock code) or contact your service provider to unlock your device.
Incorrect SIM PIN code. Enter PUK code or contact your mobile network operator for more information.
SIM is disabled. Please contact your mobile network operator.
Pattern required at regular intervals for additional security
PIN required at regular intervals for additional security
SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code or contact your mobile network operator for more information.
SIM \"%1$s\" is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. Contact operator for details.
%1$s Disable eSIM to use device without mobile service.
You have incorrectly typed your password %1$d times. \10\10Try again in %2$d seconds.
You have incorrectly drawn your unlock pattern %1$d times. \10\10Try again in %2$d seconds.
You have incorrectly typed your PIN %1$d times. \10\10Try again in %2$d seconds.
Desktop full backups aren\'t currently protected
New password and confirmation don\'t match

Be pleasantly surprised by seeing your memories on Ambient display!\10If you are relaxing at home, a selection of your personal photos will be displayed. If you are out and about, past photos taken at your location will be shown. You might be surprised by your long-forgotten memories from this spot!\10
%s will start capturing everything that\'s displayed on your screen.
Always keep mobile data active, even when Wi‑Fi is active (for fast network switching).
You won\'t have access to data or the Internet through %s. Internet will only be available via Wi-Fi.
You\'re connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
You\'re connected to %1$s, which can monitor your personal network activity, including emails, apps and websites.

Your work profile is managed by %1$s. The profile is connected to %2$s, which can monitor your work network activity, including emails, apps and websites.\10\10You\'re also connected to %3$s, which can monitor your personal network activity.

Your work profile is managed by %1$s. The profile is connected to %2$s, which can monitor your work network activity, including emails, apps and websites.\10\10For more information, contact your admin.
You\'re connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
Your organisation installed a certificate authority in your work profile. Your secure network traffic may be monitored or modified.
Your work profile is connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites.

Your device is managed by your organisation.\10\10Your admin can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device and your device\'s location information.\10\10For more information, contact your admin.
Your organisation installed a certificate authority on this device. Your secure network traffic may be monitored or modified.

Your device is managed by %1$s.\10\10Your admin can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device and your device\'s location information.\10\10For more information, contact your admin.
You\'re connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
Your personal profile is connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
You\'re connected to %1$s and %2$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
You gave an app permission to set up a VPN connection.\10\10This app can monitor your device and network activity, including emails, apps and websites.

Your work profile is managed by %1$s.\10\10Your admin is capable of monitoring your network activity including emails, apps and websites.\10\10For more information, contact your admin.\10\10You\'re also connected to a VPN, which can monitor your network activity.
To exit split-screen, touch and hold the Recent apps key
Couldn’t complete sign-up. Tap to try again
No devices found. Try turning on %1$s
If you don\'t want %s to use this feature, tap to open settings and turn it off.

About %1$s left based on your usage (%2$s)

With power notification controls, you can set an importance level from 0 to 5 for an app\'s notifications. \10\10Level 5 \10- Show at the top of the notification list \10- Allow full screen interruption \10- Always peek \10\10Level 4 \10- Prevent full screen interruption \10- Always peek \10\10Level 3 \10- Prevent full screen interruption \10- Never peek \10\10Level 2 \10- Prevent full screen interruption \10- Never peek \10- Never make sound and vibration \10\10Level 1 \10- Prevent full screen interruption \10- Never peek \10- Never make sound or vibrate \10- Hide from lock screen and status bar \10- Show at the bottom of the notification list \10\10Level 0 \10- Block all notifications from the app
About %1$s left based on your usage
Enabling STAMINA mode in Power management will optimise battery lifetime
Do Not Disturb was turned on by an app (%s).
Do Not Disturb was turned on by an automatic rule (%s).
Your organisation may monitor network traffic in your work profile
Device is managed by your organisation
Your organisation manages this device and may monitor network traffic
Device is managed by your organisation and connected to %1$s
Device is managed by your organisation and connected to VPNs
%1$s may monitor network traffic in your work profile
%1$s manages this device and may monitor network traffic
Device is managed by %1$s and connected to %2$s
Device is managed by %1$s and connected to VPNs
You can also open Quick settings by swiping down from the top to the centre of the screen
Torch cannot be turned on\10while the camera is in use
VoLTE is not currently supported\10by your service provider
Remove System UI Tuner from Settings and stop using all of its features?

Screen pinning locks the display in a single view.\10\10You cannot receive any incoming calls nor can a third party search your location until you unpin. Also, some apps may not work or notifications may not appear properly.\10\10To unpin, touch and hold ◁ (back button) and □ (recent apps button) at the same time.

Screen pinning locks the display in a single view.\10\10You cannot receive any incoming calls nor can a third party search your location until you unpin. Also, some apps may not work or notifications may not appear properly.\10\10To unpin, touch and hold ◁ (back button) and □ (recent apps button) at the same time.

Screen pinning locks the display in a single view.\10\10You cannot receive any incoming calls nor can a third party search your location until you unpin. Also, some apps may not work or notifications may not appear properly.\10\10To unpin, touch and hold the back and home buttons at the same time.

Screen pinning locks the display in a single view.\10\10You cannot receive any incoming calls nor can a third party search your location until you unpin. Also, some apps may not work or notifications may not appear properly.\10\10To unpin, touch and hold the back and home buttons at the same time.
Taking screenshots isn\'t allowed by the app or your organisation
Display App Not Responding dialogue for background apps
Allow %1$s to show slices from any app
You have entered an incorrect password, PIN or pattern %1$d times.\10You have %2$d more attempts before the device will be factory-reset.\10\10To continue safely, please enter the following:
Touch and hold icons to rearrange quick settings

Any changes that you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your phone.\10\10Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes that you make on the phone to the web.\10\10To choose what kinds of data you sync for each account, go to Settings > Accounts & sync.

Any changes that you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your device.\10\10Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes that you make on your device to the web.\10\10To choose what kinds of data you sync for each account, go to Settings > Accounts & sync.\10\10Data charges may apply when updating your device. An unlimited data plan is recommended.
Flash screen when apps do long operations on main thread

Your phone was too hot, so it turned off to cool down. Your phone is now running normally.\10\10Your phone may get too hot if you:\10\9• Use resource-intensive apps (such as gaming, video or navigation apps)\10\9• Download or upload large files\10\9• Use your phone in high temperatures
Because an app is obscuring a permission request, Settings can’t verify your response.
Affects the tone of the synthesised speech
This language requires a working network connection for Text-to-Speech output.

This speech synthesis engine may be able to collect all the text that will be spoken, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the %s engine. Enable the use of this speech synthesis engine?
These experimental features may change, break or disappear in future releases. Proceed with caution.
System UI Tuner gives you extra ways to tweak and customise the Android user interface. These experimental features may change, break or disappear in future releases. Proceed with caution.
No installed apps work with this USB accessory. Learn more about this accessory at %1$s
To protect your device from liquid or debris, the USB port is disabled and won’t detect any accessories.\10\10You’ll be notified when it’s OK to use the USB port again.
The computer\'s RSA key fingerprint is:\10%1$s
When you add a new user, that person needs to set up their space.\10\10Any user can update apps for all other users.
Check apps installed via ADB/ADT for harmful behaviour.
Debugged application waits for debugger to attach before executing
Reduces battery drain and improves network performance
Increase Wi‑Fi logging level, show per SSID RSSI in Wi‑Fi Picker
You won\'t hear your next alarm %1$s
You won\'t hear your next alarm %1$s unless you turn this off before then
You won\'t be disturbed by sounds and vibrations, except from alarms. You\'ll still hear anything you choose to play including music, videos and games.
You won\'t be disturbed by sounds and vibrations, except from alarms, reminders, events and callers you specify. You\'ll still hear anything you choose to play including music, videos and games.
This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations, including from alarms, music, videos and games.
This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations, including those from alarms, music, videos and games.\10Please note that your device will vibrate but not play a sound when you receive Area Mail.

This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations, including those from alarms, music, videos and games.\10Please note that your device will vibrate and won\'t play a sound when you receive emergency alerts or warning emails.
